verses.verse: "Dominion<WH4910> and fear<WH6343> are with him.<WH6213> He makes peace<WH7965> in his high places.<WH4791>
Can<WH3426> his armies<WH1416> be counted?<WH4557> On whom does his light<WH216> not arise?<WH6965>
How then can man<WH582> be just<WH6663> with God?<WH410> Or how can he who is born<WH3205> of a woman<WH802> be clean?<WH2135>
Behold,<WH3394> even the moon has no brightness,<WH166> and the stars<WH3556> are not pure<WH2141> in his sight;<WH5869>
How much less man,<WH582> who is a worm,<WH7415> the son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> who is a worm!<WH8438>"
